ygData.subject: Re: Faction
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/14/99 2:25:42 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... to ... killing ... Most orcs on that island will help you with kelethin guards (they are
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/14/99 2:25:42 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Patrickje1@... writes:

> I currently have a gnome necromancer on erolissi marr and I have journeyed
to
>
> greater faydark to take on orcs and hunt in cb to get money for those
> expensive spells at 8th level. The guards hate me of course and by
killing
> orcs already Ive gotten my faction up with kelethin guards(stormguard?) so
> that only some of them kos me(which is kind of odd). I was just wondering
> if
> killing orcs also raises your faction with guards of felwithe or if it
> doesnt
> what does.

Most orcs on that island will help you with kelethin guards (they are
stormguard).

I have finally killed enough gnolls in paw and Black Burrow that guards in
Quenos, and most merchants are not KOS to me!!! I only encountered one (VERY
HIGH LEVEL!!! 4 atacks for 101!!!) merchant that hated me... a Elf Merchant
(I am Dark Elf...) I can't do dealing with them... but I am not kos at
least... I can walk in invis, bank, reinvis and walk out safely!

of course I am 18th level.... so it takes a while.

Sonoroud
